title: Chat language changing mid-game
body: About halfway through every game I've played recently, my chat changes from letters to just squares and I don't know why.  I'm not doing anything out of the ordinary, and I've made sure Windows is set to English always.

replies.body: I have never changed anything in the league client.

If you are confident nothing has been changed, then I would recommend performing a [clean re-installation of League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040).  This will allow us to completely rule out the game itself as a possible root cause.

Let me know if you are still experiencing the same issue afterwards!
This happened to me but instead it was with font. It kept going from Regular to Bold. I tried adjusting chat size too.

This...sounds just straight bizarre actually.  Have you ever made any modifications to your client, such as force using a different language pack to have the game use different VO?  Did you ever modify any of the files in your installation, such as your game.cfg file or input.ini?

Let me know!
